Uses of Command in es.ucm.fdi.lps.p3
 

Methods in es.ucm.fdi.lps.p3 that return Command
 Command Parser.parseNextCommand()
          Parses the player input, consuming its characters and returning the next command that has been identified.
 Command Game.removeNewestExecutedCommand()
          Removes the newest executed command of the command history.
 Command Game.removeOldestExecutedCommand()
          Removes the oldest executed command of the command history.
 

Methods in es.ucm.fdi.lps.p3 with parameters of type Command
 void Game.addExecutedCommand(Command command)
          Adds an executed command to the command history.
 

Uses of Command in es.ucm.fdi.lps.p3.command
 

Subclasses of Command in es.ucm.fdi.lps.p3.command
 class DropCommand
          Represents a Drop command from the player that moves an item from the player inventory to the player location.
 class ExamineCommand
          Represents an Examine command from the player that that shows a list of the items in the player inventory or shows the description of an specific item, depending on the use mode.
 class GoCommand
          Represents a Go command from the player that moves the player in a given direction.
 class HelpCommand
          Represents a Help command from the player that shows the help information of the game.
 class LookCommand
          Represents a Look command from the player that shows the description of the player location.
 class QuitCommand
          Represents a Help command from the player that ends the game.
 class TakeCommand
          Represents a Take command from the player that moves an item from the player location to the player inventory.
 class UndoCommand
          Represents a Take command from the player that undoes the last executed command.
 

Uses of Command in es.ucm.fdi.lps.p3.test.mock
 

Subclasses of Command in es.ucm.fdi.lps.p3.test.mock
 class CommandMock
          Mocks the Command class.
